TextLibrary.Text: Queen Gwendholyn
Your father tells me that you did well.
Your father tells me that you did well.
Your father tells me that you did well.
Your father tells me that you did well.
He was being kind, your Majesty.
He was being kind, your Majesty.
He was being kind, your Majesty.
He was being kind, your Majesty.
Well, be that as it may, I have another favor to ask you.
Well, be that as it may, I have another favor to ask you.
Well, be that as it may, I have another favor to ask you.
Well, be that as it may, I have another favor to ask you.
I'm at your service.
I'm at your service.
I'm at your service.
I'm at your service.
Our forces are stretched to their limits. Orcs keep pouring over the mountains from the east, taking our people prisoner. And now the dead are rising from their graves within our very borders.
Our forces are stretched to their limits. Orcs keep pouring over the mountains from the east, taking our people prisoner. And now the dead are rising from their graves within our very borders.
Our forces are stretched to their limits. Orcs keep pouring over the mountains from the east, taking our people prisoner. And now the dead are rising from their graves within our very borders.
Our forces are stretched to their limits. Orcs keep pouring over the mountains from the east, taking our people prisoner. And now the dead are rising from their graves within our very borders.
Yes, my father told me. He believed that an evil cult was responsible.
Yes, my father told me. He believed that an evil cult was responsible.
Yes, my father told me. He believed that an evil cult was responsible.
Yes, my father told me. He believed that an evil cult was responsible.
And perhaps they are... But, for now all I need is somebody to travel north into Theira and find one of these Undead creatures - a Skeleton that has been tormenting the peasants near the Royal Crypt.
And perhaps they are... But, for now all I need is somebody to travel north into Theira and find one of these Undead creatures - a Skeleton that has been tormenting the peasants near the Royal Crypt.
And perhaps they are... But, for now all I need is somebody to travel north into Theira and find one of these Undead creatures - a Skeleton that has been tormenting the peasants near the Royal Crypt.
And perhaps they are... But, for now all I need is somebody to travel north into Theira and find one of these Undead creatures - a Skeleton that has been tormenting the peasants near the Royal Crypt.
I'll leave at once, your Majesty. And I will listen for news of this cult during my travels.
